actions.name: create_phone_number
actions.description: Buys a new phone number and binds agents.

actions.name: get_agent
actions.description: Fetch details of a Retell AI agent by Agent ID.

actions.name: get_call
actions.description: Retrieve detailed data of a specific call (e.g., transcript), given a Call ID.

actions.name: get_phone_number
actions.description: Retrieve full details for an existing phone number in Retell AI.

actions.name: get_voice
actions.description: Retrieve details for a specific voice model or configuration by ID in Retell AI.

actions.name: make_phone_call
actions.description: Initiate a new outbound phone call using Retell AI agents.

triggers.name: new_call
triggers.description: Triggers when a new outgoing or incoming call is created.
